title: During prayer should we look at place of prostration
transcript: without any problem during prayer should we look at the place of prostration when standing yes when when bowing some say that you look exactly underneath your head which is in the middle area some say you look at the place of prostration some say look between your legs so it seems that there is a room for manoeuvre when you're sitting down you look at your finger as you are moving it into a hood so you constantly keep on looking at your finger while you're moving it third question for
